post.title: talk about trading? why not sell one thing, and then you know whta is trading and what is need
post.body:
again, this force you to think:

- who is your target clients
- what you provide to them

post.title: idea of the day - online trading
post.body:
the online trading platform is needed to handle needs like this -

http://127.0.0.1:43110/12BYDUaA1zjg13r7yfn4x4jg4DehqEBF8b

design features -

- vendor listing 
- buyer login and pay and able to follow up with evaluation of service: this evaluation is independent of the vendor and can only be controled by the buyer.
- the key will be a credit system that form credible evaluation of both sides of the trade.

as the platform operator, how you make money? 

- first of all, the maintainance cost of this platform is extremely low.
- it is not hard to come up a way to make money on trade

post.title: Why
post.body: The need for significant enhancement of the infrastructure and service for zeronet is as apparent as its promise. Without funding all these promises can not happen quickly. Let's raise money and fund the further development of zeronet.

post.title: How we invest
If you are simply a zero
post.body: That is fine and fun too. Being a zero is a great thing. Let's learn, grow, and one day start a zero business.

post.title: If you are a programmer
If you are an investor
post.body:
We would like to talk to you. We can work flexibly on investment terms. Please drop us a note here.

Our objective is clear - we raise money and invest in zero businesses.

If you want to donate, simply donate to this site, and we will pool akll donations and invest in zero startups.

post.title: If you are a zero startup
post.body: We would like to hear from you. Please simply drop us a note here. Let's talk about your zero business.

post.title: Raising money for zero businesses
post.body:
We would like to work with - 

- small investment institutions
- regular VCs
- angel investors
- research institutions that have projects and funding for next generation technology projects

post.body:
